subject: Relationships
title: The Read Receipt Dilemma
description: A fast breakdown of The Read Receipt Dilemma for builders.

hook.text: 'Read 2:47 PM.' No reply. It's now 4:00 PM. Your brain spirals. They read it and chose silence.

buildup.text: Read receipts create a surveillance dynamic. Every message becomes a test: 'How fast will they respond?'

discovery.text: Psychologists call this 'technoference' ‚Äî technology interfering with relationship quality and security.

twist.text: People who disable read receipts report less anxiety. Removing the data removes the trigger.

climax.text: Technology promised connection but delivered monitoring. Real trust doesn't need timestamps as evidence.

punchline.text: Read receipts measure response speed, not love.
